alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:56PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bennington and northern Windham Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 155 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Manchester Center, or near Manchester, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bellows Falls, Londonderry, Manchester, Saxtons River, Manchester Center, Windham, Rockingham, Jamaica, Grafton, Athens, Peru, North Westminster, Stratton Valley, Brockways Mills, Bondville, Peru Town Center, Stratton Acres, Rawsonville, Intervale and South Windham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southern Vermont.
